trustfund: TF054897-TFSCB: SRI LANKA STAT CAP TRUST FUND

abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the Public
            Sector Capacity Building Project for Sri Lanka is to enhance
            the effectiveness, efficiency and productivity of the
            Recipient's Department of Census and Statistics (DCS)
            and Auditor General's Department (AGD). The closing
            date of the project will be extended from December 31, 2012
            until December 31, 2013. The extension is necessary to
            ensure the sustainability of the human resource development
            initiatives carried out under the project by establishing a
            departmental training center for AGD in Ratnapura. The
            government of Sri Lanka had earlier requested a one-year
            extension to December 31, 2012 for: completing the training
            program of the DCS postponed due to Island wide census of
            population and housing; and utilizing the resources
            allocated under the human resource development and
            communication and external relationship sub-component under
            the AGD. The extension will enable AGD to sustain training
            to audit staff in regional offices after the conclusion of
            the project.
